title: Drakkar Noir By Guy Laroche - Original Vintage Designer Fragrance Blend For Men - Fresh, Classic Men’s Evening Scent - Long Lasting Amber Fougere Aroma With Spicy Citrus Notes - 3.4 Oz EDT Spray
features: INDULGE IN THE ICONIC HOUSE FRAGRANCE. Launched by the storied French Fashion House Guy Laroche in 1982, the vintage Drakkar Noir Eau De Toilette for Men gained worldwide fame, and the scent remains a designer cologne classic 30 years later.

INTENSE, LONG LASTING SCENT. Excite and enthrall your senses with a fragrance that emanates all day. Mist on this Eau De Toilette fragrance and outlast the competition with an extreme wear spray that maintains aromatic payoff from day to night.

A MESMERIZING BLEND OF CITRUS AND SPICE. Classic yet complex, this amber men’s fragrance stimulates the senses with citrus top notes, easing into a spicy heart of juniper and coriander, and drying into a powerful pine, patchouli and balsam finish.

ANYTHING BUT ORDINARY. Sensual and explosive with unexpected notes at every turn, the Drakkar Noir fragrance is strong and effortlessly inviting, like the wearer himself. Blended for everyday wear, but proves especially enticing as an evening scent.

SEXY, STREAMLINED PACKAGING. Drakkar Noir For Men arrives in a classic black arc bottle adorned with the House’s original 80s logo. Designed for easy transportation, you can bring the Laroche fragrance alongside you wherever you travel.
description: Launched by the storied French fashion House Guy Laroche in 1982, Drakkar Noir Eau De Toilette for Men gained instant worldwide fame. The vintage Fougere fragrance remains a classic, trendy cologne staple over 20 years later.
